name: full-stack-open-part3
description: Full stack open course - Part 3: Programming a server with NodeJS and Express - Exercises

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open-part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../full-stack-open-part3/build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Víctor Piñón
